0110101011000110 0001000101100011 1 -> sum: 0111110000101010, cout: 0
1001100101110010 0110010001100101 0 -> sum: 1111110111010111, cout: 0

1000110101101001 1110010110100011 1 -> sum: 0111001100001101, cout: 1
1001101011110101 1010000111011001 0 -> sum: 0011110011001110, cout: 1
0101001011110101 1100010101101010 0 -> sum: 0001100001011111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
